meaningMnemonic: The <radical>door</radical> leading to the <radical>moon</radical> can be broken down with one’s <kanji>shoulder</kanji>. It’s not a very sturdy door to the moon, so it’s quite easy to drop your shoulder and ram it open.
readingMnemonic: "Wow, your <kanji>shoulder</kanji> is just like my <reading>cata</reading>pult (かた)!" you hear someone shout. As you turn you're just in time to see a man catapulting through his own moon door!
